sith_analysis

myutils.sith.sith_analysis.sith_analysis(drelaxed, dstreched, xyz_file)[source]

Creates the sith analysis.

Parameters:

  • drelaxed (str) – fchk file corresponding to the relaxed structure

  • dstretched (str) – fchk file corresponding to the stretched structure. In case this argument is a directory, all fchk files in there will be considered as the result of the stretching.

  • xyz_file (str) – xyz file of one of the configurations in order to find the Hydrogen atoms.
